text: Sir Roy's United Federal Party is boycotting the London talks on the Protectorate's future. Said Mr. Nkumbula last night:"We want to discuss what to do if the British demonstrations." Yesterday Sir Roy's chief aide, Mr. Julius Greenfield, telephoned his chief a report on his talks with Mr. Macmillan at Chequers.
